'''Fragile Resin''' instantly restores 60 [[Original Resin]]. Up to a maximum of 20 can be exchanged at once.

==Obtain==
* [[Adventure Rank]] Rewards
** Gain ×1 at: Ranks 12, 14, 16, 18, 20–24, 26, 28
** Gain ×2 at: Ranks 25, 27, 29–60
* Using [[Cake for Traveler]] (×1, given on the Traveler's birthday)
* [[Battle Pass]] - [[Sojourner's Battle Pass]] Reward (×5 per Battle Pass period)
* [[Battle Pass]] - [[Gnostic Hymn]] Reward (×5 per Battle Pass period, costs real money)
* [[Battle Pass]] - [[Gnostic Chorus]] Reward (×5 per Battle Pass period, costs real money)
* [[Wayfarer's Supply Bundle]] (×1 per week, costs [[Genesis Crystal]]s)
* [[Klee Mail|Klee's Secret Event]] Reward Days 1–4 (×1 per day, given through mail; limited time from 10/23/2020-11/11/2020)
* [[Sacred Sakura]] (×5, Rewarded at Level 1, 11, 21, 31, 41)
* [[Enhance the Lumenstone Adjuvant]] (×1, Given at Level 1)
* [[Vanarana's Favor]] (x5, Rewarded at Level 1, 11, 21, 31, and 41)
